text:
Sean Malone (April 12, 1970 – December 9, 2020) was an American musician. He played mainly fretless bass guitar and Chapman Stick. However, Malone also played piano, keyboards, and guitar. His most famous for his work was in American band Cynic, in which he developed a strong partnership with the drummer Sean Reinert.
On 9 December 2020, it was announced that Malone had died.
